summary:
Off the Hook Plushies 
 The above two Splatoon 2 × Hello Kitty Tentacles Mascot plushies will be available at UFO catcher crane...
caption:
Off the Hook Plushies

The above two Splatoon 2 × Hello Kitty Tentacles Mascot plushies will be available at UFO catcher crane machines in Sega Centers across Japan from 07 February.

Buy Splatoon 2 Ikasu Artbook

summary: @zebratoastart was one of the winners of my Ko-fi sketch giveaway on Twitter! He asked for Princess Peach! She’s one of my mains...

summary: Famitsu: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Download Numbers
title: Famitsu: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Download Numbers
body:
Famitsu: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Download Numbers

Japanese magazine and sales tracker Famitsu has published their estimated digital download numbers for a number of high-profile Nintendo Switch games such as Super Smash Bros Ultimate and Splatoon 2. Famitsu reports that digital sales numbers for the brilliant Super Smash Bros Ultimate are 309,229 as of 30 December 2018.

  • Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: 309,229
  • Futari de Nyanko Daisensou (The…

summary: Japan: Famitsu Most Wanted Nintendo Games For January 24th – 30th, 2019
title: Japan: Famitsu Most Wanted Nintendo Games For January 24th – 30th, 2019
body:
Japan: Famitsu Most Wanted Nintendo Games For January 24th – 30th, 2019

Once again, Famitsu has released the results of their weekly reader poll. If you didn’t already know, Famitsu asks their Japanese readers on a weekly basis what Nintendogames they are looking forward to the most. One week later, they will release the results in their Weekly Famitsu issue. This week saw Animal Crossing, known in Japan as Doubutsu no Mori, at the number one spot once again. In…

View On WordPress

summary: Borderlands 3 podría ser el juego “sin anunciar” de Take-Two
title: Borderlands 3 podría ser el juego “sin anunciar” de Take-Two
body:
Take-Two ha revelado sus resultados fiscales a sus inversores, confirmando el éxito de Red Dead Redemption 2 y sus 23 millones de copias vendidas, o el cada vez más importante rol de Nintendo Switch en sus beneficios. Pero eso no es todo, pues a futuro, la empresa ha querido dejar claro que tiene un gran […]

La entrada Borderlands 3 podría ser el juego “sin anunciar” de Take-Two aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..

caption:
Famitsu Most Wanted

  1. Doubutsu no Mori (Switch) - 481
  2. Dragon Quest XI: Sugisarishi Toki o Motomete S (Switch) - 371
  3. Bayonetta 3 (Switch) - 332
  4. Shin Megami Tensei V (Switch) - 326
  5. Fire Emblem: Fuuka Setsugetsu (Switch) - 304
  6. Ushiro (Switch) - 241
  7. Yokai Watch 4 (Switch) - 194
  8. Super Robot Taisen T (Switch) - 178
  9. Luigi Mansion 3 (Switch) - 176
  10. Keito no Kirby Plus (3DS) - 127
  11. Yoshi Craft World (Switch) - 109
  12. Lulua no Atelier ～Arland no Renkinjutsushi４～ (Switch) - 99
  13. Darius Cozmic Collection (Switch) - below 99

Notes: Period counted 24 - 30 January. Ushiro topped the Newcomers chart with 477 votes. New entry for Darius. Taken from this week’s issue of Weekly Famitsu which you can buy here (use the code JPNINTENDO for $3 USD off).

  9. Luigi Mansion 3 (Switch) - 176
  10. Keito no Kirby Plus (3DS) - 127
  11. Yoshi Craft World (Switch) - 109
  12. Lulua no Atelier ～Arland no Renkinjutsushi４～ (Switch) - 99
  13. Darius Cozmic Collection (Switch) - below 99
  14. Chocobo no Fushigi na Dungeon EVERY BUDDY！(Switch) - below 99

Notes: Period counted 24 - 30 January. Ushiro topped the Newcomers chart with 477 votes. New entry for Darius. Taken from this week’s issue of Weekly Famitsu which you can buy here (use the code JPNINTENDO for $3 USD off).

summary:
For real though, 
Making Mewtwo the first character to appear in the pokemon anime opening, thus alluding to a wider pokemon...
body:
For real though,

Making Mewtwo the first character to appear in the pokemon anime opening, thus alluding to a wider pokemon mythology right off the bat, waiting years to find out what was going on, and setting the stage for revealing the origins of not just Mew and Mewtwo but also team rocket, Giovanni and even Jesse after a fashion is one of the most inspired creative choices I’ve seen in fiction.

Good job pokemon opening animators!

And happy birthday Mewtwo 🎉🎁
